mapper.insert: insert into `systemlog` (opUser_id, opTime, oplp, function, params) values (#{opuser.id}, #{optime}, #{oplp}, #{function}, #{params})
mapper.select: select s.id, s.opTime, s.oplp, s.function, s.params, e.id e_id, e.username e_username from `systemlog` s LEFT JOIN employee e ON opUser_id = e.id
